name: mcp-poc
description: UI augmentation for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers

scripts.dev: pnpm build:bundles && pnpm concurrently "pnpm --filter @mcp-poc/mcp-server dev" "pnpm mcp-client:dev" "pnpm mcp-ui-app:dev" --names "MCP_SERVER,MCP_CLIENT,MCP_UI_APP" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow"
